articles.author: Boubacar Diallo | AP
articles.title: Guinea's opposition says it will boycott February elections
articles.description: Guinea opposition parties said Wednesday they will not participate in February legislative elections, and will fight to have them delayed, if the president does not withdraw a bid to seek another term
articles.content:
At least five parties said they will not participate in the Feb. 16 vote and called for new demonstrations on Jan. 13 to oppose the legislative elections and to renew the demand that Conde withdraw his proposed changes to the constitution.
Not only will we n… [+1212 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Blake
articles.title: Nikki Haley’s incredible explanation of her comment that Democrats are ‘mourning’ Soleimani
articles.description: Haley says Democrats are « mourning » Soleimani because they say we'd be better off with him around. Even if that made sense, that's not what Democrats are saying.
articles.content: Mourning comes in different forms, Haleys office said. It doesnt have to be literally crying over the casket like Ayatollah [Ali] Khamenei. Leading Democrats are aggressively arguing that we would be better off if Qassem Suleimani was still alive today. That … [+3343 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Ambrose
articles.title: Scenes at the Manassas National Battlefield Park during first snow of 2020 (Photos and Video)
articles.description: At times, the snowflakes grew larger than cornflakes which stuck to everything like big spitballs.
articles.content: Snow moved in fast and furious in the western suburbs of D.C. which quickly pasted the ground, trees and side streets with one to three inches of wet accumulation. From D.C. and points east, rain turned to snow and was slower to accumulate due to warmer tempe… [+924 chars]

articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Erik Sorga of Estonia signs with D.C. United
articles.description: Sorga, who averaged almost a goal per game last year in his low-level domestic league, will initially join second-division Loudoun United but is expected to be called up as soon as possible.
articles.content:
D.C. United on Wednesday completed the acquisition of Erik Sorga, a promising Estonian forward who averaged almost a goal per game last year in his low-level domestic league.
Officially, he will join Loudoun United, D.C.'s second-division squad, and not coun… [+3113 chars]

articles.description: One candidate caught the others napping.

articles.author: Chris Richards
articles.title: Uptown XO is telling a story bigger than himself
articles.description: The veteran D.C. rapper celebrates his latest album at Wicked Bloom.
articles.content: Hes still here, though, and his strange surroundings have changed how he raps. I used to write street stories, but lyrically, Im past that, XO explains over lunch a bright orange plate of General Tsos at an eatery on 14th Street NW. I want to preserve, not my… [+1939 chars]

articles.author: Rudi Greenberg
articles.title: Yola does not need a microphone
articles.description: The British singer with the powerful voice and four Grammy nominations is coming to the District.
articles.content:
She does not need a microphone, Yola dryly replied.
She had a point. In a space as intimate as Boilens desk, which forces singers to perform raw and unamplified, the sheer power of Yolas voice was overwhelming. When she was ready to film, her band launched i… [+4521 chars]
